p: For the 16” Hole-Section, the tool selected (i) Bentonite/KCl polymer, (ii) Chrome-lignin based fluid and (iii) Lignosulphate based fluid as mud systems suitable for the hole-section ( Fig. 8a). When their performances with the formation and environment were considered using the chart presented in Fig. 8b, Bentonite/KCl polymer mud was selected as the most suitable among the three mud systems.
